name: green 🌱 thumb
description:
made for ludum dare 44 theme: your life is currency

link to ldjam page

what do you do when you need cash quick?? money doesn't grow on trees... but it does grow in flower pots! invest your funds wisely and garden your way to your goals! 

content warning: depictions of blood and self harm

this game is primarily controlled with mouse movement and the left mouse button. esc to pause, Q to quit. when the hand cursor is opaque, or changes to a white icon, that indicates that what you're hovering over is  interactable!

there are three different endings!

by cakeknuckles and jellicube
